name: My Name Is... (El fideo rubio)
description:
You are MB 53 13 3, a maintenance bot. Your job is to fix dysfunctions on a spaceship.

This game has been made in 100 hours for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3

*E for interact with the audio logs or elements in the scene.

*Press E again to exit the interaction.

*Make sure you face the small panel on the recharging station to restart the day.

*Shift + esc to open the menu.

*If you play the credits you need to restart by alt+f4.

*The menu at the end of the credits doesn't work so you guessed it alt+f4.


Credits :

Hector "Fideo" Santamaria - Project Lead, Art and Character Design.

Emile "FynixForever" Ponson - Game, Level and Environnement Design.

Lucas "MioMilo" Venturini - Blueprint Programming and Narrative Design.

Kylen "Kylenin3D" Laws - Art and Environnement Design.

Saulo "Saulo" Carranza - Sound Production.
